title: Current selection should reflect connection state in right panel.
author: GitCitizen
body_snippet:
Current selection under "Connections" should reflect connection state in right panel. 

mRemote automatically switches to the previously (and currently) logged in server screen but stays on the last server name under connections. This is very confusing and a security issue for me. 
The user should make their own choice to which server to select next, if any.

|Operating system | Windows 10 x64 |
|mRemoteNG version| 1.75.7012.16814|

iterations.description: The issue describes a clear, self-contained UI enhancement to keep right-panel status aligned with the selected connection without needing additional clarification.

notes:
AI triage (codex): The issue describes a clear, self-contained UI enhancement to keep right-panel status aligned with the selected connection without needing additional clarification.
Approach: Hook selection-changed and connection-state-changed events to refresh the right panel so it always reflects the currently selected connection's live state.
